description: Partial approval of details application pursuant to Condition 8 (Piling Method Statement) - in relation to Block B2 only - of planning consent ref: P2017/2065/FUL, dated 21/06/2018.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: You are advised that condition 8 is only partially discharged and this approval relates to Block B2 only.

Piling details for Blocks C and J were approved under application ref: P2020/2894/AOD, dated 06/09/2021. Piling details for Block B were approved under application ref: P2022/1414/AOD, dated 17/02/2022. 

No piling in relation to any other blocks can take place until the relevant details, as outlined in condition 8, have been approved by the local planning authority.

application_details.lead_developer_company_name: Thames Water Utilities, Development Control Department
